description: small, pyramid-shaped structure with indentation near top; woven bands and round and tube-shaped beads in purples, greens and yellows overall
text: Elaine Small creates intricate, miniature sculpture using traditional basket making techniques of coiling and knotting. Although many of her works contain specific narrative and conceptual elements, some, such as Volcano on Bead Mountain, are given a suggestive title that allows viewers an opportunity to engage their imaginations.
title: Volcano on Bead Mountain
